cab.content: Co itN ftgotol Jones19s his DocumentSECRET.EATTLH SITUATION - HORNING - 3rd APRIL, 1918.1. There has'"been no change on the battle front, A small attack by the 32nd Division last night enabledus to recapture AYETTE with 100 prisoners and 3 machine-guns.2, The French reserves are arriving according to time-table .3, The withdrawal of tired British Divisions is proceedingsatisfactorilyaGeneral Staff, Har Office. 3rd April, 1918.Issued at 12,45 p0m.
